title: Bug 121170 - get column label from meta data object should return user recognizable strings
description: The current implementation of the getcolumnlabel() method in the meta data object is causing an issue where null labels are returned before extraction, while recognizable strings are returned after extraction. This bug report suggests that the getcolumnlabel() method should consistently return user recognizable strings regardless of whether the extraction has been performed or not.
OB: When calling getcolumnlabel() before extraction, null labels are returned. After extraction, recognizable strings are returned.
EB: The getcolumnlabel() method should consistently return user recognizable strings from the meta data object, regardless of whether the extraction has been performed or not. This is necessary because the labels need to be displayed to the end user before extraction.
